# Trace4Cats Components

[![Build & Release](https://github.com/trace4cats/trace4cats-components/workflows/Build%20&%20Release/badge.svg)](https://github.com/janstenpickle/trace4cats/actions?query=workflow%3A%22Build+%26+Release%22)
[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/trace4cats/community](https://badges.gitter.im/Join%20Chat.svg)](https://gitter.im/trace4cats/community?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)
[![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)

This repository contains the standalone deployable components of [Trace4Cats](https://github.com/trace4cats/trace4cats).

See [the documentation](https://github.com/trace4cats/trace4cats/blob/master/docs/components.md) for more details.
